ComicInfo.Title: A Gift for Venus; Day by Day with Hopey: “Tuesday is Whose Day?”; Hagler and Hearns; 2 'R's, 2 'L's; Ser o No Ser; Sea Hog Serenade; Julio's Day [Part 12]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jaime starts a new seven-issue series documenting a week in the life of Hopey Glass, and gives us another great stand-alone Ray story. This handsome new issue also includes the latest "Julio's Day" chapter, featuring Julio's brother, Benjamin, returning from fighting the Japanese in the Philippines — with a Japanese wife! Also, another installment of Motivational Speaker Mark's troubles with his ex-wife; and the revealing of a mysterious sea monster's history. Viva Los Bros!
